title: Tata Power Solar Systems rooftop solar installations reach 600 in Chhattisgarh
description: Tata Power Solar Systems Ltd has installed rooftop solar systems at over 600 locations in Chhattisgarh. The initiative, 'GharGharSolar, Tata Power ke Sang', aims to provide clean energy to households across the state. Residents can receive government subsidies to make solar installations more affordable and accessible.
